Andrew Dye

  • reesenews multimedia journalist
  • Journalism, visual communication (photojournalism) sequence
  • Senior, Cary, N.C.
  • andrew.dye@reesenews.org
  • http://www.andrewdye.com
  • Follow Me on Twitter

Andrew spent the last two years working at the Daily Tar Heel as a photographer and assistant photo editor. Andrew also interned with The Herald-Sun in Durham and has worked for other publications including Sports Illustrated magazine. He participated in documentary projects for UNC including the Carolina Photojournalism Workshop projects “Being Asheville” and “What Now Argentina?” He is interested in watching and participating in the evolution of the journalism industry. Andrew hopes to cover conflict and international strife after graduation.
